channel.title: Congrats to Taharok!
channel.description:
For he is our newest Global Moderator!
It's been a long time coming, and he has more than earned it. :)

item.title: Congrats to Taharok!

@Uriko wrote:

congrats taha

item.title: Congrats to Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:38, topic:290388”][quote author=Full Metalst link=topic=383896.msg2882719#msg2882719 date=1248419568]
OMG they m00ted m3h f0r n0 r3as0n…

Jkz, grats on mod Tico and Taharok.
[/quote]Err, what? Tico has ahad mod for awhile.

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=383896.msg2882400#msg2882400 date=1248410542]

you didn’t learn from Tico?

Of course we learned from Tico, he has done such a good job we will probably get all the rest of our staff from moparscape.

Hopefully I get banned before that day.

Lol.

Seriously, no conspiracy. We just try to keep a broad a selection of candidates in mind when making choices like this. Anyone who becomes a gmod is subject to quite a lot of scrutiny and discussion before the final choice is made.

Perhaps more people on this ‘side’ of the forum should get their acts together and establish themselves as both reliable and trustworthy individuals.

Exactly.

[quote author=the bank link=topic=383896.msg2882111#msg2882111 date=1248399212]

you didn’t learn from Tico?

Of course we learned from Tico, he has done such a good job we will probably get all the rest of our staff from moparscape.
[/quote]You are joking right? Not taking a hit at Tico or Taharok, however selecting all future staff from there is absurd.

I was exaggerating, but the point is that Lothy and Tico have done nothing short of an excellent job since they were promoted, so obviously it doesn’t matter which site you start out on.
[/quote]I’m sure the same could be said for staff that have started on this site.[/quote]
Better late than ever.

Wow Taharok, you’ve been here since 2006? Makes me feel like a noob. I’ve only been here since 2007/2008 :.

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats to Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:22, topic:290388”][quote author=Taharok link=action=profile;u=28549 date=1166834689]
Do not worry about it. We are pals, remember? I know this tutorials section well and I know your stuff is original (because you have been asking me loads of questions on them .) You are alright, trust me. I am positive you will be ok. If, for some extremely unknown reason, you somehow get banned (email me if this happens. Then I will not rest until you are unbanned (I am on good terms with kmb, BobDole, Ron, moparisthebest, Starblaster100, Algas, and over half of the Moparscape Community.)
[/quote]
^ Old PM ^

Haha, good old memories when I got accused of stealing someones code when someone actually stole mine. :mad:
Thankfully Taharok was there.

Private server days, ha. :rolleyes:

Anyways, congrats.[/quote]

That was a blast from the past. I can barely remember 2006 anymore.

Thanks everyone, I hope the changes coming up are for the better.

Read full topic
